DOC.brief_title: The Effect Obesity Growth Hormone Response Anaerobic Exercise
DOC.detailed_description: Exercise potent physiological stimulator growth hormone ( GH ) release . GH important factor distribution fat lean tissue body . Previous study suggest GH response aerobic exercise may attenuate obesity . The effect obesity GH response anaerobic effort unclear . The aim present study ass effect obesity anaerobic exercise 's GH response . We recruit 12 obese ( BMI > 30 ) healthy adult 12 age gender match normal weight ( BMI < 25 ) control . All participant conduct `` wingate '' anaerobic test ( 30 second intense effort resistance calculate individual 's body weight ) . Blood sample GH level collect 5 different time ( 0 , 20 , 30 , 40 60 minute test ) . We compare GH response two group .
DOC.criteria: Healthy female Age 1840 Male Age < 18 , > 40 Heart , Liver , Kidney Hypophyseal disease Medications may alter GH secretion ( eg Steroids , Eltroxin )
